about_the_game:
Zerra's Adventure is a classic turn-based RPG with no random encounters. Explore diverse areas, collect items and treasures to improve your team and defeat the strangest enemies. Level up, learn new attacks, and meet quirky characters on your adventure!




Explore diverse landscapes, from frog-filled forests to infernal deserts and dark caves infested with spiders. Face dangers like spikes, fireballs, and shots as you search for treasures, weapons, and other items that will aid you in your adventure, even in a gym filled with insane bodybuilders.




Confront a wide variety of enemies, from small turtles and pigs to armed rabbits and final bosses such as giant frogs and penguins. Utilize your skill and strategy to overcome their signature attacks and progress through the game.




Solve simple and classic genre puzzles during your adventure and find secret bonuses that will challenge you with short minigames that reward your skill with special and unique items.




Improve your party by gaining experience and leveling up. Discover new attacks and passive abilities that offer different benefits to the team. Customize each character with weapons and accessories found during your adventure, choosing between increasing attack, defense, or special abilities according to your gameplay style. The choice is yours!





  • Fast-paced turn-based battles with no random encounters.
  • Six playable characters, each with their own unique attacks, skills and personalities!
  • Explore every nook and cranny of the 5 dungeons to discover treasure and meet quirky characters.
  • Enjoy simple puzzles and minigames that offer tasty rewards to enhance your party.
  • Customize your team using the "Accessory System": focus on attack, defense, healing, special abilities, or hundreds of other options!
  • Short and sweet: designed to be completed in under 10 hours, respecting your valuable time.
